page.title: 06St Michael's Church
page.content: St. Michael's Church has only one clock face. It was built in the {13th {century.}There are 8 bells in the bell tower. It has 2 chandeliers and a font which babies get christened in. The church has monster heads on it to keep evil spirits away. It has a beer barrel in the roof. The vicar is called Canon Tostevin. We have a Sunday School in the Stable rooms.It is really called Children's Church. There is a big safe in the place where the choir get changed and there is a big plate. It is bigger than the one at Wells Cathedral. There is a small chalice made of silver.
